column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=BW : They pander .
#Text=Slowly they take away the aspects of what made those characters who and what they were .
#Text=In other words , cartoons contained sometimes gratuitous violence with the squash and stretch animation .
#Text=Sometimes it was gratuitous .
#Text=But that was only an aspect of the cartoon .
#Text=When you start stripping away those things that made it a full dimension character , you ’re going to have Xeroxes of it in every way including creativity .
#Text=The worst mistake Warner Brothers ever did was make all these characters friends , because then you took away the dynamic .
#Text=Elmer wanted to kill Bugs Bunny .
#Text=There was no question in anybody ’s mind .
#Text=Sylvester wanted to kill Tweetie .
#Text=There was no question in anyone ’s mind , unless you wanted to say ,
#Text=“ He just wanted to eat him .
#Text=He did n’t want to kill him . ”
#Text=Go figure that out .
#Text=There was danger involved , and some life truths involved .
#Text=When you ’re telling the truth , you ’re really dealing with comedy .

#Text=If you do n’t have the truth on your side , then comedy ca n’t spring from it , unless you have some weird hydroponic garden that does n’t need any of the standard things that it takes to grow something .
#Text=DS : How do you choose a project , or does the project choose you ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=It works both ways .
#Text=I get offers for stuff .
#Text=If it looks like a good offer , I ’ll take it .
#Text=I ’m not a snob .
#Text=I love working , and every now and then somebody will say ,
#Text=“ Why did you do that ? ”
#Text=You know what ?
#Text=It ’s none of your business .
#Text=All I owe you is a good performance .
#Text=DS : Where do you think voice acting is going ?
#Text=It does n’t seem like it ’s ever an art that ’s going to lose its place , but do you see it diminishing ?
#Text=Is it on a downturn ?
#Text=Is it on an upturn ?
#Text=Is it idling ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=What they ’re doing slowly is they ’re going to have to turn the celebrities and actors into cartoons , slowly but surely , because it ’s the look that people are seduced by .
#Text=It ’s almost as if they like watching animation more than they do live action because of all the farms of kids being fostered to love computer-generated images .
#Text=If you do n’t do this , if you do n’t start turning all of the celebrities into cartoons , we ’ll lose our star system .

#Text=It ’s better to have their likenesses with their voices rather than trying to act out something that sprung from someone ’s imagination that needed a concerted effort to give it a voice , a look .
#Text=These characters are actors , they look like themselves , but they ’re doing it with cartoon and computer processing .
#Text=This is where it ’s going .
